goal.ch: 課程目的在於培養學生融會所學得之基礎理論，發揮想像力與創意力，實際應用在工業產品之設計與製作上。以啟發互動式教學方法，激發學生創造思考之精神與能力，從而具有設計與創造發之能力。期望藉由課程之啟發與訓練，學生能將創意融入生活，使生活中處處有創意，並激發出各類設計發明的新點子。幫助學生統整以前所學得的知識與技能，並且瞭解工業產品設計與開發的流程，以培養手腦並用、充滿創意的現代工業技術人才。課程中並強調不同領域學生之合作學習，以培養學生全方位之思維。

課程目的在於培養學生融會所學得之基礎理論，發揮想像力與創意力，實際應用在工業產品之設計與製作上。以啟發互動式教學方法，激發學生創造思考之精神與能力，從而具有設計與創造發之能力。期望藉由課程之啟發與訓練，學生能將創意融入生活，使生活中處處有創意，並激發出各類設計發明的新點子。幫助學生統整以前所學得的知識與技能，並且瞭解工業產品設計與開發的流程，以培養手腦並用、充滿創意的現代工業技術人才。課程中並強調不同領域學生之合作學習，以培養學生全方位之思維。

The objective of this course is to cultivate students‘ ability to integrate fundamental theories, utilize imagination and creativity, and apply them practically in the design and production of industrial products. Through interactive teaching methods, the course aims to inspire students‘ creative thinking spirit and abilities, equipping them with the capability for design and innovation. It is hoped that through the inspiration and training provided by the course, students will be able to integrate creativity into their daily lives, making creativity a part of everyday life and sparking new ideas for various design inventions. The course helps students consolidate previously acquired knowledge and skills, understand the process of industrial product design and development, and develop into modern industrial technology talents who use both hands and minds creatively. Additionally, the course emphasizes cooperative learning among students from different fields to foster comprehensive thinking.

outline.en:
1. Creativity and Creative Design
(a) What is Creativity?
(b) Creative Problem Solving and Obstacles

(b) 4Q Creative Traits
(c) Lateral Thinking
(d) Mind Mapping
3. Formation and Grouping of Creative Teams
(a) Team Formation
(b) Conceptualization of Creative Projects
(c) Production of Creative Projects
(d) Product Verification
4. Creative Competitions

(a) Basic Principles and Methods

(d) Application of Basic Creative Principles II
6. Creative Engineering Design Methods in Mechanical Engineering
7. Case Studies of Everyday Creativity and Introduction to Important Inventions Worldwide
